page.title: 05CUSTOMS
page.content:
{BISHOPS NYMPTON REVEL 1985.
Revel means be merry and happy most people have a party on the occasion. We have a revel in BISH_NYM every year in{MAY.}On the night before the {Revel,}there were some people's names put into a hat to see who was going to be the{Revel queen}and also there was needed two princesses. The draw was made later on that night. The two princesses were Julie Rollins aged 9\, the second princess was Heather Sparkes age 6 and the Revel queen was to be Celia Fields age 14. It was Mr.DARTS trailer, there was 16 people on the float. The school float was the shape of a rectangle. There were trees in every corner of the trailer and there were flowers all around the side of the trailer. {By Tracy Blakesey.
